mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ASS_INSPECTION (
group_id ,
hos_id ,
copy_code ,
ins_id ,
ins_no ,
ins_name ,
ass_year ,
ass_month ,
ass_nature ,
dept_id ,
dept_no ,
create_emp ,
create_date ,
audit_emp ,
audit_date ,
state ,
note
) VALUES (
#{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
ASS_INSPECTION_SEQ.nextval ,
#{ins_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{ins_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{ass_year,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{ass_month,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{ass_nature,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{dept_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{dept_no,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{create_emp,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{create_date,jdbcType=DATE} ,
#{audit_emp,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{audit_date,jdbcType=DATE} ,
#{state,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
)

INSERT INTO ASS_INSPECTION (
group_id ,
hos_id ,
copy_code ,
ins_id ,
ins_no ,
ins_name ,
ass_year ,
ass_month ,
ass_nature ,
dept_id ,
dept_no ,
create_emp ,
create_date ,
audit_emp ,
audit_date ,
state ,
note ,
) select ASS_INSPECTION_SEQ.nextval , t.* from(
select
#{item.group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{item.hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{item.copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{item.ins_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{item.ins_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{item.ins_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{item.ass_year,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{item.ass_month,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{item.ass_nature,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{item.dept_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{item.dept_no,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{item.create_emp,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{item.create_date,jdbcType=DATE} ,
#{item.audit_emp,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{item.audit_date,jdbcType=DATE} ,
#{item.state,jdbcType=INTEGER}
#{item.note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
from dual
)t
mapper.select:
select a.group_id, a.hos_id, a.copy_code, a.ins_id, a.ins_no, a.ins_name, a.ass_year, a.ass_month, a.ass_nature, n.naturs_name, a.dept_id, a.dept_no, h.dept_code, h.dept_name, a.create_emp, s.user_name create_emp_name, a.create_date, a.audit_emp, s1.user_name audit_emp_name, a.audit_date, a.state, a.note from ass_inspection a
left join HOS_DEPT_DICT h on a.dept_id=h.dept_id and a.group_id=h.group_id and a.hos_id=h.hos_id and h.is_stop=0 left join sys_user s on s.group_id=a.group_id and s.hos_id=a.hos_id and s.user_id=a.create_emp left join sys_user s1 on a.group_id=s1.group_id and a.hos_id=s1.hos_id and s1.user_id=a.audit_emp left join ASS_NATURS n on a.ass_nature=n.naturs_code WHERE a.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.ins_id = #{ins_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
a.ins_id as id, a.ins_no, a.ins_name, a.group_id, a.hos_id, a.copy_code, a.ass_year, a.ass_month, a.ass_nature, n.naturs_name, a.dept_id, a.dept_no, h.dept_name, a.create_emp, s.user_name create_emp_name, a.create_date, a.audit_emp, s1.user_name audit_emp_name, a.audit_date, case when a.state = 0 then '新建' when a.state = 1 then '审核' when a.state = 2 then '终止' else '' end state, a.state, a.note
from ass_inspection a left join HOS_DEPT_DICT h on a.dept_id=h.dept_id and a.group_id=h.group_id and a.hos_id=h.hos_id and a.dept_no=h.dept_no left join sys_user s on s.group_id=a.group_id and s.hos_id=a.hos_id and s.user_id=a.create_emp left join sys_user s1 on a.group_id=s1.group_id and a.hos_id=s1.hos_id and s1.user_id=a.audit_emp left join ASS_NATURS n on a.ass_nature=n.naturs_code where a.group_id = #{group_id} AND a.hos_id = #{hos_id} AND a.copy_code = #{copy_code} AND a.ins_id in (${paraId}) order by a.ins_id asc

select
a.ins_id as id, a.ins_no, a.ins_name, a.group_id, a.hos_id, a.copy_code, a.ass_year, a.ass_month, a.ass_nature, n.naturs_name, a.dept_id, a.dept_no, h.dept_name, a.create_emp, s.user_name create_emp_name, a.create_date, a.audit_emp, s1.user_name audit_emp_name, a.audit_date, case when a.state = 0 then '新建' when a.state = 1 then '审核' when a.state = 2 then '终止' else '' end state, a.state, a.note
from ass_inspection a left join HOS_DEPT_DICT h on a.dept_id=h.dept_id and a.group_id=h.group_id and a.hos_id=h.hos_id and a.dept_no=h.dept_no left join sys_user s on s.group_id=a.group_id and s.hos_id=a.hos_id and s.user_id=a.create_emp left join sys_user s1 on a.group_id=s1.group_id and a.hos_id=s1.hos_id and s1.user_id=a.audit_emp left join ASS_NATURS n on a.ass_nature=n.naturs_code where a.group_id = #{group_id} AND a.hos_id = #{hos_id} AND a.copy_code = #{copy_code} AND a.ins_id = #{ins_id} order by a.ins_id asc
